name: Quartet Whiteboard, Glass Dry Erase Board, Magnetic, 6' x 4', Infinity Frameless Mounting, White Surface, Accessory Tray, 1 Dry Erase Marker and 2 Glass Board Magnets (G7248W)
short_description: SLEEK GLASS – Elevate your office, school or home with this Infinity Glass Whiteboard. The sophisticated and modern design makes it a unique focal point of your space

CLEAN ERASE – Non-absorbent glass lets you write, erase and rewrite on a clean surface. The 72"W x 48"H (6' x 4') board is both stain and ghost resistant, so your message can be communicated without distracting streaks

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED – Quartet Glass Whiteboards meet the strict GREENGUARD GOLD standard for low-emissions, which means better indoor air quality in homes, offices, schools, healthcare facilities and sensitive environments
LONG-LASTING GLASS – The durable, tempered glass resists scratches and dents and is ideal for heavy use. Designed for long-term performance and backed by a 15-year limited warranty
MAGNETIC SURFACE – Securely display papers and documents with the 2 high-powered glass board magnets (included)
EASY INSTALLATION – Pass-through mounting makes installation simple. Screws insert through the front, so you can hang it accurately and evenly. Mount it vertically or horizontally to fit your space

INCLUDED IN BOX – Comes with glass board, removable accessory tray, 1 marker, 2 high-powered glass board magnets, mounting hardware and easy-to-follow instructions. For best results use Quartet Glass Board Accessories (sold separately)
product_description: Quartet Infinity Glass Dry Erase Board blends versatile functionality with a modern upscale look. The frameless glass design appears to float on your wall, making it a focal point of your space. As this board is made with non-absorbent glass, you can write, erase and rewrite on a clean surface, without fear of stains or ghosting. This board is designed for long-term performance. The strong tempered glass surface resists scratches and dents, and is ideal for heavy use. Plus, the magnetic, steel-backed glass makes it easy to hang papers and documents instantly. Great for meetings and presentations. Installation is simple with the included pass-through mounting hardware. As the screws insert through the front, you can hang the board accurately and evenly. Mount it vertically or horizontally to fit your space. Board comes with limited 15 year warranty, a removable accessory tray, one marker and two high power glass board magnets for your convenience.

short_description: Innovative Design – Holds Lightweight Magnetic Items: 4× thicker than standard whiteboard paper with a durable PET writing film. The sticker itself is not magnetic; it has a soft iron layer that holds lightweight magnetic objects like letters, numbers, pins, memos, and photos, turning smooth surfaces into creative multifunctional boards.
Easy writing and erasing: This magnetic whiteboard paper for wall writes smoothly and erases easily without leaving any ghosting, even after 60 days.

Create Inspiration: We provide a complete starter kit for you to get creative and capture your ideas. This magnetic paper is perfect for use in the home, kitchen, office, classroom, studio, playroom, and more

Easy Installation: Only suitable for smooth, flat, and dust-free surfaces. Our magnetic board for wall comes with a strong self-adhesive backing, eliminating the need for drilling or tools. Simply peel off the backing paper and apply it to a clean, dry surface. The gridline design on the backing paper helps you accurately cut the magnetic wallpaper to the desired size
